# repo Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    terraform = {
      source  = "speakeasy/terraform"
      version = "0.13.2"
    }
  }
}

provider "terraform" {
  # Configuration options
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive)
- `server_url` (String) Server URL (defaults to https://app.unleash-hosted.com/hosted)
